page.title: 07Shopping, Eastbourne
page.content: {Terminus Road }is a {pedestrianised} area in the centre of town. Some shops have access to the Arndale Centre. Shoppers walk peacefully in safe surroundings or rest on one of the many benches. Seaside leads from Terminus Road and has many smaller specialized shops.Here are {Eastbourne's {traditional style seaside souvenir {shops.} One of Eastbourne's smaller shopping attractions is the {Enterprise Centre. The building was once an engine shed and it has been skilfully converted to retain its historical atmosphere. Inside it has wrought iron pillars, railings & stairways with original decorative iron work. The centre contains many small shops which are rented at low cost.An open market is held outside on Tuesdays & Saturdays.
